name: Multi-modal Enterprise Knowledge Base in Manufacturing
welcome: Welcome to Multi-modal Enterprise Knowledge Base in Manufacturing
projectDescription: Offers a streamlined workflow for developing scalable, production-grade agent-based applications
solutionName: Multi-modal Enterprise Knowledge Base in Manufacturing
welcomeMessage: Hello, how can I help you today?
chatDescription: Click the button on the right to start a new conversation with chatBot
ingestDesc: Please select the file to be imported
ingestIntentionDesc: Please select the imported file to create intention
selectFileDesc: After the file is successfully uploaded, the ingestion process will begin.
indexTypeDesc: Please select an appropriate index type
deleteTips: Are you sure you want to delete the selected item?

detailNoFiles: No files or please waiting execution to complete
recallByKeywordDesc: Recall up to TOP_K documents that meet the set Threshold by keywords.
recallByEmbeddingDesc: Recall up to TOP_K documents that meet the set Threshold by embeddings.
scenarioDesc: Applicable scenario for the current session
modelNameDesc: LLM used in the current session
embeddingModelNameDesc: Embedding model that used in the chatbot
maxTokenDesc: Max length of tokens that LLM process in a sequence
maxRoundsDesc: Max rounds of dialog that saved in memory
temperatureDesc: Higher values make the output more random
topKKeywordDesc: Retrieve top K most relevant documents based on keyword.
topKEmbeddingDesc: Retrieve top K most relevant documents based on embedding.
topKRerankDesc: Number of top documents participate in reranking.
scoreDesc: Outputs with a relevance score below the threshold will not be sent to LLM
embeddingModelDesc: Used for vectorizing text for this chatbot.
rerankModelDesc: Used for re-ranking retrieval results for this chatbot.
vlmModelDesc: Used for analyzing and processing images for this chatbot.
indexComment: Please separate multiple indexes with a comma.
question: question
intentionFailMsg: Intention type must be qd index value of the robot or the specified tool name (chat/get_weather)
qaListDesc: Here is a list of questions uploaded in this batch.
updated: Update completed, redirecting to the list page....
promptCreateTips: New prompt will override current prompt, are you sure to continue?
promptDeleteTips: Delete the prompt will reset to the system default prompt.
chatbotCreateTips: New chatbot will override the current chatbot, are you sure to continue?
chatbotDeleteTips: Delete the chatbot will reset to the system default chatbot.
intentionDeleteTips: Delete these executions will delete all the relative data in the system.
indexNameDesc: Cannot duplicate an existing index name
toAvoidTips: To avoid accidental deletions we ask you to provide additional written consent.
deleteAlert: This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.
deleteIntentionFailed: These data could not be deleted because it is being used by other indexes.
indexListDesc: Here is a list of indexes of this chatbot.
defaultIndexDesc: Answer question based on search result
chatbotNameDesc: The unique identifier of the robot space, it must not duplicate with any existing ones
modelDesc: Used for text vectorization in the robot space.
chatbotModelProviderError: This chatbot does not support the selected model provider
indexUsedByModel: This index is already associated with other embedding models
selectADocumentToPreview: Select a document to preview its content

button.login: Log in to Multi-modal Enterprise Knowledge Base in Manufacturing

header.reSignInDesc: You have logged out of your account. Please click 'Reload' to log in to the web console again

validation.requireModel: Please select or input a model
validation.requireApiKeyArn: Please input an API key ARN
validation.repeatChatbotName: Chatbot name is already used, please change the name
validation.repeatIndex: This index is already used by other users
validation.requireMaxTokens: Please enter a maximum number of tokens
validation.requireMaxRounds: Please enter a maximum number of rounds
validation.requireTopKKeyword: Please enter top K based on keywords
validation.requireTopKEmbedding: Please enter top K based on embedding
validation.requireTopKRerank: Please enter top K for reranking
validation.requireKeywordScore: Please enter threshold value for keyword recall
validation.requireEmbeddingScore: Please enter threshold value for embedding recall
validation.temperatureRange: The temperature must be between 0 and 1
validation.maxTokensRange: The maximum number of tokens must lager than 0
validation.maxRoundsRange: The maximum number of rounds must greater than or equal to 0
validation.topKRetrievals: the value of top K retrievals must lager than 0
validation.score: The score must be between 0 and 1
validation.formatInvalidTagIndex: Only letters, numbers, -, and _ are allowed
validation.indexNameEmpty: Index name can not be empty.
validation.indexValid: Index is used by other model, please change index name
validation.repeatedIndexName: The index is duplicated with a previous entry, please modify it
validation.repeatedIndex: The index name is already in use. Please choose a different name
validation.noStartWithUnderscoreOrDash: Name cannot start with underscore or dash
validation.onlyStandardEnglishAllowed: Name can only contain English lowercase letters, numbers, underscores, dashes, and periods

tour.home: Deploying this solution using the default parameters will build the environment in Amazon Web Services.
tour.chat: Click here to start chatting with the AI assistant.
tour.session: Session history contains all your chat history, you can resume the chat by choosing the chat history.
tour.chatbot: You can create/edit/delete the chatbots. Each chatbot has at least one index for Intention/QD/QQ, Intention index stores the chatbot intentions, QD index stores the knowledges, QQ index stores the FAQ.
tour.intention: Manage your intentions here. The intentions are uploaded via excel files, the chatbot will chat according to the intentions you provided, if no intention is provided, it will retrive knowledges by default.
tour.kb: You can create/update/delete knowledges. Choose index type as QD to inject a knowledge, and choose QQ index type to inject FAQ (only in excel format).
tour.prompt: Manage your prompts here. Conversation summary prompt will rewrite the queries in your chat history, RAG prompt is for how to use the retrieved knowledges to help LLM generate responses, tool calling prompt defines how the agent choose and invoke tools.

subTitle: Streamlined Workflow for Building Agent-Based Applications

feat1.name: Enterprise Knowledge Base Construction
feat1.desc: Its data preprocessing module includes format recognition, content extraction, metadata conversion, and semantic segmentation, seamlessly in the background.

feat2.name: Flexible Mode Options
feat2.desc: Enables users to create customized chatbots for various scenarios. Users can input specialized knowledge and intents to meet different business needs. It offers multiple LLMs and embedding models, with flexible configuration of prompts and conversation settings. Adjustable parameters include Top K, conversation limits, and optional features like image generation, allowing for personalized user experiences

apiModelNameDesc: Enter the model name for the API
apiKeyArnDesc: Enter the ARN of the secret in AWS Secrets Manager that stores the API key for Bedrock/OpenAI
